A Slayer cape is the Cape of Accomplishment for players who have achieved level 99 in the Slayer skill. The cape can be purchased for 99,000 coins from Duradel (slayer master), in Shilo Village. Slayer capes are black in colour, and have a red trim if the player has more than one level 99 skill. Note that since Duradel is in Shilo Village, the Shilo Village quest must be completed before the player can obtain the Slayer cape.

A player performing the slayer cape's emote.

Like all skill capes, the Slayer cape gives +9 to all defensive stats, and also a +4 bonus to prayer if it is trimmed, which requires a separate skill at level 99. The cape is automatically trimmed if this condition is met.

When the slayer cape is equipped or in your inventory, there is a 10% chance of being given the option to have a previous slayer task reassigned when speaking to a slayer master in person or through the NPC Contact spell. For slayer assigments from Konar quo Maten, the location she asks players to slay can be different from the previous task. For any boss assignments, the boss assigned can be different from the previous task. The cape also allows players to use slayer masters with combat level restrictions which they do not meet.

This item can be stored in the cape rack of a costume room, as part of the Slayer cape set, along with the hood. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

As of 1 May 2022, there are 98,045 current members that have achieved level 99 in Slayer.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 December 2020
(update | poll)

The Slayer cape can now be shown to Slayer masters to bypass the required Combat level for Slayer task assignment.

3 December 2015
(update | poll)

The Slayer cape grants a slim chance of being able to persuade a slayer master to reassign your last task.

A '''Slayer cape''' is the [[Cape of Accomplishment]] for players who have achieved level 99 in the [[Slayer]] skill. The cape can be purchased for 99,000 [[coins]] from [[Duradel]] (slayer master), in [[Shilo Village (location)|Shilo Village]]. Slayer capes are black in colour, and have a red trim if the player has more than one level 99 skill. Note that since Duradel is in Shilo Village, the [[Shilo Village]] [[quest]] must be completed before the player can obtain the Slayer cape.
[[File:Slayer cape emote.gif|thumb|190px|A player performing the slayer cape's emote.]]
Like all [[Capes of Achievement|skill capes]], the Slayer cape gives +9 to all defensive stats, and also a +4 bonus to prayer if it is trimmed, which requires a separate skill at level 99. The cape is automatically trimmed if this condition is met.

When the slayer cape is equipped or in your inventory, there is a 10% chance of being given the option to have a previous [[slayer task]] reassigned when speaking to a [[slayer master]] in person or through the [[NPC Contact]] spell. For slayer assigments from [[Konar quo Maten]], the location she asks players to slay can be different from the previous task. For any boss assignments, the boss assigned can be different from the previous task. The cape also allows players to use slayer masters with [[combat level]] restrictions which they do not meet. 

{{Costume storage|cape rack|Slayer cape set, along with the [[Slayer hood|hood]]|set=true}}
